name: YouTube Real Cinema Mode
description:
Don't like these small videos on YouTube pages? Me too. So one day I decided to change that and created this userstyle.
This style expands video to fill all free space inside browser window. Like a fullscreen YouTube but not fullscreen. You'll like it!
Scroll YouTube page down to see comments and other stuff. Move cursor to top and the top bar with search will appear. ------Unfortunately, the userstyle doesn't work with YouTube Premium for now.------ ------ATTENTION! Old YouTube design (pre-2017) is no longer supported. So turn on a modern design on YouTube if you want to continue to use the YTRCM.------ ------Please try to uninstall and install the userstyle again if it don't work for you anymore even with modern design (which is unlikely).------
additional_info: If you have any suggestions for improvement of this userstyle please leave a feedback message. ___________ Changelog: 30 may 2019 - Autoplay switch is now accessible when video is not in theater mode. 19 apr 2019 - Option to hide or show the scrollbar (hide by default). Also fixed color of top bar. 7 apr 2019 - Fix for position of close button on panels like multicam or share panel. 26 jul 2018 - Yep, YouTube changed something again and I fixed something. Again. 16 jul 2018 - Fix for ℹ️ button at the right top corner and drawer. Now it is accessible and not overlapped by top panel. 14 jul 2018 - Quickfix for another one update of YouTube. 17 jun 2018 - Options and support for old (pre-2017) YouTube design is removed. 18 sep 2017 - Fixed a bug where low res videos did not stretch to the full screen. 16 sep 2017 - Finally support for the new YouTube design! If you want you can select old version in Advanced Style Settings. 5 jun 2017 - YAY! 100k downloads! Thank you all! 3 sep 2016 - 50000+ Installs Celebration Update. Settings! Now you can choose to hide the top bar or not. Thank you all for using and sharing this style! - One more thing today. No longer need for positioning the settings menu after some update of YouTube so I removed this code. 8 jun 2016 - Position problem fixed. I guess. 9 may 2016 - 360 videos is stretched to full screen now, although on some screens it can have a slight discrepancy in aspect ratio. - Centered annotations. Accessible but not fitted properly. - Settings menu is not in the right corner anymore. 7 may 2016 - Little fix for 360 videos. Now they are displayed in the center, but not stretch on the entire screen yet. - Playlist box not hides behind the video anymore. - Tooltip text and rewind thumbnails now displayed at the bottom of the screen, not in the center. - And one more fix for content under the video. 30 dec 2015 - Fix for ad box. Now it expands properly. 28 dec 2015 - Some animation improvements
